channel.title: Tippmann Gryphon
channel.description:
Should I get a Tippmann Gryphon? They cost $70, they look nice.. but I'm not sure if its worth the $70. I have a Tippmann 98 custom. A response trigger costs $70. I'm not sure whether to get a whole new gun or to upgrade my current gun.
Should I get the Gryphon or should I get a response trigger?

item.title: Tippmann Gryphon
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Response trigger. The tippman 98 custom is a nice gun. Do you have barrel rifling?

Read full topic
